mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT `sys_menu`.* FROM `sys_menu`,( SELECT DISTINCT menu_id FROM `sys_role_menu` , ( SELECT DISTINCT role_id FROM `sys_user_role` WHERE user_id = #{ userId } AND is_deleted = 0 ) AS t1 WHERE `sys_role_menu`.role_id = t1.role_id AND is_deleted = 0 )AS t2 WHERE `sys_menu`.id = t2.menu_id AND is_deleted = 0
SELECT sys_menu.* FROM `sys_menu`,( SELECT menu_id FROM `sys_role_menu` WHERE role_id = #{ roleId } AND is_deleted = 0) AS t WHERE t.menu_id = sys_menu.id AND sys_menu.is_deleted = 0 AND `status` = 1
